bio.en: Gabriel is an assistant researcher working at médialab during the year 2015-2016. He graduated from Bowdoin College in 2015, and is hoping the apply as a doctoral student the following year. His interest focuses on South-American identity formation and applying notion of symmetrical anthropology to the layering of local, national and global identities.
bio.fr: Gabriel est assistant de recherche au médialab durant l’année 2015-2016. Il a reçu son diplôme Bachelors of Arts and Sciences du Bowdoin College aux Etats-Unis, et il prévoit de se présenter en doctorat l’année prochaine. Il s’intéresse particulièrement aux notions d’identité en Amérique du Sud.
